constituent: grow late, Ameratasu, one, ceiling, sun, tucked under the arm
heisigStory: The implication behind the meaning of grow late is that things are changing in the same way that the day turns into night. The elements: ceiling . . . sun . . . tucked under the arm.
koohiiStory1: At nightbreak (#30) the sun rises above the floor, so it is logical that when it is growing late, the sun would rise to the ceiling. Time to pack up your things and take your belongings under your arm.
koohiiStory2: It´s starting to GROW LATE, so God will take the SUN, and TUCK IT UNDER HIS ARM, and walk away. In the morning, he´ll bring it back, so don´t worry.
kunYomi: さら、さら.に、ふ.ける、ふ.かす
myStory: lớn muộn. thức khuya. khuya. mặt trời dưới cánh tay
readingExamples: 更 (さら), 更かす (ふ.かす), 更ける (ふ.ける)
words: staying up late, keeping late hours, sitting up late at night, nighthawk
furthermore, again, after all, more and more, moreover
